String.string: You hear a massive gears begin grinding...
A portal opens for the guardian priest.
Siegrea has appeared! Stop the blizzard ritual!
The ritual is complete! The blizzard comes!
Kaprima Reborn is proceeding with the Curse Summon Ritual!
I will burn every single one of you!
You will receive a boon in 30 seconds.
Recharge the statue with your lifeforce to defeat Siegrea!
Stop Kornus from building its defense!
The entrance will close in 10 seconds!
Evade the drill attack by hiding behind the crab!
